TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void WebPartCancelEventHandler(object sender, WebPartCancelEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed WebPartCancelEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub WebPartCancelEventHandler(sender As Object, e As WebPartCancelEventArgs)
public delegate void WebPartCancelEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, WebPartCancelEventArgs ^ e);

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示將處理 類別之 、事件、 事件或 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event, event, or event of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中指定的方法委派時，會呼叫事件，事件，或就會引發事件。The method specified in the delegate is called when a event, event, or event is raised. 網頁開發人員可以提供的自訂處理常式 Web 組件事件加`OnSelectedWebPartChanging`屬性`OnWebPartClosing`屬性，或`OnWebPartDeleting`屬性``項目 頁面上，指定給該屬性的自訂方法名稱。Page developers can provide custom handlers for Web Parts events by adding an `OnSelectedWebPartChanging` attribute, `OnWebPartClosing` attribute, or `OnWebPartDeleting` attribute to the `` element in a page, and assigning a custom method name to the attribute. 自訂處理常式也可以指派以程式設計的方式。A custom handler can also be assigned programmatically. 如需有關以程式設計的方式指派的事件處理常式的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 如何： 連接事件處理常式方法的事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/348e9600-22e3-49a2-8864-11c5bb3e98fc)。For more information on programmatically assigning an event handler, see [NIB: How to: Connect Event Handler Methods to Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/348e9600-22e3-49a2-8864-11c5bb3e98fc).
